statements: SELECT * FROM weather_data ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT location, temperature FROM weather_data WHERE humidity > 80
SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE temperature < 20 AND humidity < 50
SELECT location, humidity FROM weather_data ORDER BY location ASC
SELECT id, date FROM weather_data WHERE temperature BETWEEN 25 AND 30
SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT location, temperature FROM weather_data WHERE humidity < 50 ORDER BY location ASC
SELECT AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp, MIN(humidity) AS min_humidity FROM weather_data WHERE location = 'New York'
SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-07-01' AND '2021-07-31' AND humidity > 60 ORDER BY temperature DESC
SELECT location, SUM(temperature) AS total_temp FROM weather_data GROUP BY location HAVING total_temp > 100
SELECT * FROM weather_data ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT temperature, humidity FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 30;
SELECT * FROM location_data WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT location_name FROM location_data ORDER BY location_name ASC;
SELECT AVG(temperature) AS avg_temperature, AVG(humidity) AS avg_humidity FROM weather_data;
SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT location_name, country, temperature FROM location_data INNER JOIN weather_data ON location_data.location_id = weather_data.temperature ORDER BY country ASC
SELECT AVG(temperature), MAX(humidity) FROM weather_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-01-31'
SELECT country, COUNT(*) FROM location_data GROUP BY country ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC

SELECT location, temperature, humidity FROM weather_data WHERE location = 'New York'
SELECT researcher_name, findings FROM climate_research ORDER BY research_date DESC
SELECT site_name, location FROM research_sites ORDER BY site_name ASC
SELECT id, temperature, humidity, location FROM weather_data WHERE humidity <= 50
SELECT id, temperature, humidity, location FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25.0 ORDER BY temperature DESC, humidity ASC
SELECT researcher_name, findings FROM climate_research WHERE research_date >= '2022-01-01' AND research_date < '2022-02-01'
SELECT site_name, location, activity FROM research_sites WHERE activity LIKE '%survey%' OR activity LIKE '%observation%' ORDER BY site_name
SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE humidity < 50.0 ORDER BY id
SELECT id, temperature, humidity, location FROM weather_data WHERE location = 'New York'
SELECT * FROM climate_researchers;
SELECT researcher_name, affiliation FROM climate_researchers WHERE affiliation = 'University';
SELECT station_name, location FROM weather_station ORDER BY station_name DESC;
SELECT data_id, date, temperature, humidity FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT condition_id, condition, weather_data.date FROM weather_conditions JOIN weather_data ON weather_conditions.data_id = weather_data.data_id WHERE weather_data.temperature < 20;
SELECT * FROM weather_station;
SELECT station_name, location FROM weather_station WHERE station_id = 1;

SELECT weather_data.date, weather_data.temperature, weather_conditions.condition FROM weather_data JOIN weather_conditions ON weather_data.data_id = weather_conditions.data_id WHERE weather_data.temperature > 30;
SELECT station_name, location, humidity FROM weather_station JOIN weather_data ON weather_station.station_id = weather_data.station_id WHERE humidity < 50;

SELECT MAX(temperature) AS max_temp, MIN(temperature) AS min_temp FROM weather_data
